verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And after כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> this וַיַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> smote דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> this it came to pass that David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines וַיַּכְנִיעֵ֑ם <S%H3665><s%> and subdued וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> took דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> them and David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֥תֶג הָאַמָּ֖ה <S%H4965><s%> Methegammah מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines

וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> And he smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מוֹאָ֗ב <S%H4124><s%> Moab וַֽיְמַדְּדֵ֤ם <S%H4058><s%> and measured בַּחֶ֙בֶל֙ <S%H2256><s%> them with a line הַשְׁכֵּ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> casting them down אוֹתָ֣ם <S%H853><s%> אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the ground וַיְמַדֵּ֤ד <S%H4058><s%> measured שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> even with two חֲבָלִים֙ <S%H2256><s%> lines לְהָמִ֔ית <S%H4191><s%> he to put to death וּמְלֹ֥א <S%H4393><s%> and with one full הַחֶ֖בֶל <S%H2256><s%> line לְהַחֲי֑וֹת <S%H2421><s%> to keep alive וַתְּהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> became מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> And [so] the Moabites לְדָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> became David's לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> servants נֹשְׂאֵ֥י <S%H5375><s%> [and] brought מִנְחָֽה׃ <S%H4503><s%> gifts

וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> smote דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֲדַדְעֶ֥זֶר <S%H1909><s%> also Hadadezer בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רְחֹ֖ב <S%H7340><s%> of Rehob מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king צוֹבָ֑ה <S%H6678><s%> of Zobah בְּלֶכְתּ֕וֹ <S%H1980><s%> went לְהָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> to recover יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his border בִּֽנְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> at the river (פְּרָֽת <S%H6578><s%> Euphrates ק)

וַיִּלְכֹּ֨ד <S%H3920><s%> took דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> And David מִמֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at אֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> from him a thousand וּשְׁבַע־ <S%H7651><s%> [chariots] and seven מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred פָּרָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6571><s%> horsemen וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he רַגְלִ֑י <S%H7273><s%> foot soldier וַיְעַקֵּ֤ר <S%H6131><s%> houghed דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> and David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הָרֶ֔כֶב <S%H7393><s%> all the chariot וַיּוֹתֵ֥ר <S%H3498><s%> [horses] but reserved מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at מֵ֥אָה <S%H3967><s%> of them [for] an hundred רָֽכֶב׃ <S%H7393><s%> chariots

וַתָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> came אֲרַ֣ם <S%H758><s%> And when the Syrians דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus לַעְזֹ֕ר <S%H5826><s%> to succour לַהֲדַדְעֶ֖זֶר <S%H1909><s%> Hadadezer מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king צוֹבָ֑ה <S%H6678><s%> of Zobah וַיַּ֤ךְ <S%H5221><s%> slew דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David בַּֽאֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> of the Syrians עֶשְׂרִֽים־ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> two אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> put דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> Then David נְצִבִים֙ <S%H5333><s%> garrisons בַּאֲרַ֣ם <S%H758><s%> in Syria דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus וַתְּהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> became אֲרָם֙ <S%H758><s%> and the Syrians לְדָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> to David לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> became servants נוֹשְׂאֵ֣י <S%H5375><s%> [and] brought מִנְחָ֑ה <S%H4503><s%> gifts וַיֹּ֤שַׁע <S%H3467><s%> preserved יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he הָלָֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> whithersoever he went

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> שִׁלְטֵ֣י <S%H7982><s%> the shields הַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הָי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> were carried עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> that were on the servants הֲדַדְעָ֑זֶר <S%H1909><s%> of Hadadezer וַיְבִיאֵ֖ם <S%H935><s%> and brought יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> them to Jerusalem

וּמִבֶּ֥טַח <S%H984><s%> And from Betah וּמִבֵּֽרֹתַ֖י <S%H1268><s%> and from Berothai עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> cities הֲדַדְעָ֑זֶר <S%H1909><s%> of Hadadezer לָקַ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> took הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> David נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> brass הַרְבֵּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> much מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> exceeding ס

וַיִּשְׁמַ֕ע <S%H8085><s%> heard תֹּ֖עִי <S%H8583><s%> When Toi מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king חֲמָ֑ת <S%H2574><s%> of Hamath כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for הִכָּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> had smitten דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> that David אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֵ֥יל <S%H2426><s%> army הֲדַדְעָֽזֶר׃ <S%H1909><s%> of Hadadezer

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent תֹּ֣עִי <S%H8583><s%> Then Toi אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֽוֹרָם־ <S%H3141><s%> Joram בְּנ֣וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> unto king דָּ֠וִד <S%H1732><s%> David לִשְׁאָל־ <S%H7592><s%> ask counsel ל֨וֹ לְשָׁל֜וֹם <S%H7965><s%> favor וּֽלְבָרֲכ֗וֹ <S%H1288><s%> him and to bless עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> he נִלְחַ֤ם <S%H3898><s%> him because he had fought בַּהֲדַדְעֶ֙זֶר֙ <S%H1909><s%> against Hadadezer וַיַּכֵּ֔הוּ <S%H5221><s%> and smitten כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> at מִלְחֲמ֥וֹת <S%H4421><s%> war תֹּ֖עִי <S%H8583><s%> with Toi הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> had been הֲדַדְעָ֑זֶר <S%H1909><s%> him for Hadadezer וּבְיָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> And [Joram] brought with him הָי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> had been כְּלֵֽי־ <S%H3627><s%> vessels כֶ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וּכְלֵֽי־ <S%H3627><s%> and vessels זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וּכְלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> and vessels נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> of brass

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֹתָ֕ם <S%H853><s%> הִקְדִּ֛ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> did dedicate הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Which also king דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַכֶּ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> with the silver וְהַזָּהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> and gold אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הִקְדִּ֔ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> that he had dedicated מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of all nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which כִּבֵּֽשׁ׃ <S%H3533><s%> which he subdued

מֵאֲרָ֤ם <S%H758><s%> Of Syria וּמִמּוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> and of Moab וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and of the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וּמִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> and of the Philistines וּמֵֽעֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> and of Amalek וּמִשְּׁלַ֛ל <S%H7998><s%> and of the spoil הֲדַדְעֶ֥זֶר <S%H1909><s%> of Hadadezer בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son רְחֹ֖ב <S%H7340><s%> of Rehob מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king צוֹבָֽה׃ <S%H6678><s%> of Zobah

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> gat דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David שֵׁ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> [him] a name בְּשֻׁב֕וֹ <S%H7725><s%> when he returned מֵהַכּוֹת֥וֹ <S%H5221><s%> from smiting אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> of the Syrians בְּגֵיא־ <S%H1516><s%> in the valley מֶ֑לַח <S%H4417><s%> of salt שְׁמוֹנָ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> And he put בֶּאֱד֜וֹם <S%H123><s%> in Edom נְצִבִ֗ים <S%H5333><s%> garrisons בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֱדוֹם֙ <S%H123><s%> throughout all Edom שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> put נְצִבִ֔ים <S%H5333><s%> he garrisons וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> became כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֱד֖וֹם <S%H123><s%> and all they of Edom עֲבָדִ֣ים <S%H5650><s%> servants לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> became David's וַיּ֤וֹשַׁע <S%H3467><s%> preserved יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he הָלָֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> whithersoever he went

וַיִּמְלֹ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> And David עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> over all Israel וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become דָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> and David עֹשֶׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> executed מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> and justice לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> unto all his people

וְיוֹאָ֥ב <S%H3097><s%> And Joab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְרוּיָ֖ה <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַצָּבָ֑א <S%H6635><s%> [was] over the host וִיהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <S%H3092><s%> and Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיל֖וּד <S%H286><s%> of Ahilud מַזְכִּֽיר׃ <S%H2142><s%> [was] recorder

וְצָד֧וֹק <S%H6659><s%> And Zadok בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיט֛וּב <S%H285><s%> of Ahitub וַאֲחִימֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> and Ahimelech בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶבְיָתָ֖ר <S%H54><s%> of Abiathar כֹּהֲנִ֑ים <S%H3548><s%> [were] the priests וּשְׂרָיָ֖ה <S%H8304><s%> and Seraiah סוֹפֵֽר׃ <S%H5608><s%> [was] the scribe

וּבְנָיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H1141><s%> And Benaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְה֣וֹיָדָ֔ע <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada וְהַכְּרֵתִ֖י <S%H3774><s%> [was over] both the Cherethites וְהַפְּלֵתִ֑י <S%H6432><s%> and the Pelethites וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> sons דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> and David's כֹּהֲנִ֥ים <S%H3548><s%> were chief rulers הָיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> become פ
